@MissAshes92 @JackSillin @bnorcross Well, that�s the hope - naming or categorizing a heatwave will lead to increased coverage of a heat event. 
While it�s nice to get everyone on the same page - right or wrong people turn to the media and typically not their EM or NWS.

@MissAshes92 @JackSillin @bnorcross Whether your name them or categorize them - there needs to be a sense of urgency associated with them. The archaic definition of a �heatwave� doesn�t help with. A generic 3 consecutive days of 90+ is not helpful.
